Grand Master Xenos:
Congratulations! You have now become a proud Dark Elven Palace Knight. Life as a Palace Knight may still be unfamiliar, but do not be anxious. You can learn the skills you need one step at a time from the nearby masters.
As a glorious Palace Knight whose deeds reflect the glorious name of Shilen, may your strength crush those arrogant Elves. Congratulations once again!
Our guild has prepared this small gift to assist you in your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
